content:
I think it would be useful to adopt a JS style guide for some of the style questions that can't automatically be enforced via eslint. Some options:

https://github.com/airbnb/javascript
https://github.com/uber-go/guide/blob/master/style.md
https://google.github.io/styleguide/jsguide.html

I propose to use https://github.com/airbnb/javascript. In my adventures on the web, it seems to be the most popular.
